experiences.title: Business Analyst
experiences.description: Collaborated with stakeholders across underwriting and claims to gather business requirements and translated them into detailed BRD, FRD, and SRS documents, reducing manual processing time by 25%. Conducted GAP and risk analysis for migrating legacy insurance systems to a cloud-based platform, resulting in a 22% reduction in manual reconciliation tasks. Designed interactive Power BI dashboards to visualize loss ratios, customer churn, and claims processing KPIs.

experiences.title: Junior Business Analyst
experiences.description: Participated in requirements gathering sessions with underwriters and claims managers to capture functional needs for an internal risk assessment portal. Created process models and workflow diagrams in Microsoft Visio. Performed A/B testing impact analysis on customer onboarding UI variations using SQL-based segmentation, improving form completion rate by 21%. Wrote complex SQL queries to support data profiling and validation for a large-scale regulatory compliance project.
